pullrequest.title: Support more joint types in model editor

content.raw:
For simulation of Six Axis Force/Torque Sensor using fixed joints the pose information is important, because
the joint origin is the point with respect to which the measured torque is expressed. Using the sensor pose
it is possible to change the orientation frame with respect to which the force and the torque are expressed, 
but the point is hardcoded to be the origin of the joint frame.
content.html: For simulation of Six Axis Force/Torque Sensor using fixed joints the pose information is important, because the joint origin is the point with respect to which the measured torque is expressed. Using the sensor pose it is possible to change the orientation frame with respect to which the force and the torque are expressed, but the point is hardcoded to be the origin of the joint frame.
